subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch will not be allowed to race in the Sprint Cup or Nationwide races at Texas Motor Speedway in Fort Worth after he deliberately wrecked the championship contender Ron Hornaday Jr. in the Truck Series race Friday night.
snippet: Kyle Busch will not be allowed to race in the Sprint Cup or Nationwide races at Texas Motor Speedway in Fort Worth after he deliberately wrecked the championship contender Ron Hornaday Jr. in the Truck Series race Friday night.
